Absolutely beautiful 4 Bed 3 Bath located in the heart of Boston's historic North End.
One of the most iconic neighborhoods outside your front door, steps to world class dining, shopping and more.

Laundry in Unit.
Modern appliances. 1700+ sq feet of living.
Cats OK.
